blogs.title: My first blog
blogs.body: Our subjective experience of time is highly variable. We all know that days can pass like weeks and months can feel like years, and that the opposite can be just as true: A month or year can zoom by in what feels like no time at all.
blogs.author: Arthur

blogs.title: Opening Party
blogs.body: Staying married may have long-term benefits. You can elicit much more sympathy from friends over a bad marriage than you ever can from a good divorce.
blogs.author: David
